title: Sycamore Gap sapling planted at Minnie Pit memorial site spreads message of hope
description: A sapling from the felled Sycamore Gap tree is planted at Staffordshire's Minnie Pit memorial garden.
content:
The planting of a Tree of Hope at a site dedicated to a mining disaster that killed more than 150 people is a fitting tribute, a champion of the site has said.
Forty-nine saplings have been grown from seeds gathered from the Sycamore Gap tree that wa... [912 chars]

title: Israel launches strikes on Gaza in further test of fragile ceasefire
description: Local authorities say Israeli airstrikes targeted a car in the densely populated Rimal neighbourhood of Gaza City and homes in other parts of the territory, including Deir al Balah and Nuseirat camp.
content:
Israel says it has begun striking Hamas targets in Gaza, reportedly killing at least 24 people, after what it called a "blatant violation of the ceasefire agreement".
Local health authorities in Gaza said there had been four separate airstrikes.
One ... [1859 chars]

title: Boris Johnson took four days off as NHS warned Covid could ‘overwhelm’ system
description: Files show then PM was walking dog, riding motorbike and hosting guests as pandemic planning stalled in ‘lost month’
content:
Boris Johnson took four days off from official government business during a key period in the UK’s Covid preparation when the NHS was bracing to be “overwhelmed” by the virus.
Official disclosure for the period in February 2020 – described by the Cov... [6255 chars]

title: End of fossil fuel era inches closer as Cop30 deal agreed after bitter standoff
description: Wealthy countries agree to triple funds for countries to tackle climate impacts, but deforestation and critical minerals blocked from final deal
content:
The world edged a small step closer to the end of the fossil fuel era on Saturday, but not by nearly enough to stave off the ravages of climate breakdown.
Countries meeting in Brazil for two weeks could manage only a voluntary agreement to begin disc... [6985 chars]

title: Andrey Santos after win at Burnley: ‘Our team is like a family’
description: Andrey Santos believes the 'family' environment at the club is helping to get the best out of him, after the midfielder produced a superb performance to help us beat Burnley 2-0.
content: It was a battling display at Turf Moor as the Blues remained resilient and defensively rigid against a competitive Burnley side that threatened to pose problems. Pedro Neto gave us a crucial lead heading into the break after he dived on Jamie Gitten’... [1875 chars]
